about_the_game:
Fool’s Gold is chaotic, couch co-op treasure hunting mayhem! Partner up and play as a pair of bumbling adventurers as you fight and fumble your through ancient locales, seeking the most valuable treasure possible. Teamwork is key, as you'll need to navigate deadly traps, perilous enemies and environmental puzzles, to transport your treasure back to the escape vehicle before time runs out!

Planned Features:

  • 20+ Levels
  • 7 Different Locales
  • A Unique Curse and Mode of Transport Every Level
  • 3 Core Tools including a Torch, Shovel and Dynamite
  • 10 Special Varieties of Treasure
  • 5 Different Classes of Deadly Enemies
  • A Cheeky Monkey who will be after your Treasure!
  • High Scores, Challenges, Outfits and tons more replayability

short_description: Fool’s Gold is a chaotic, couch co-op adventure-themed heist! Two bumbling explorers will work together to traverse ancient tombs and temples, grabbing as much treasure as they can, while contending with deadly traps, perilous enemies, and environmental puzzles.
